meanings.definition: A small decorative molding resembling a twisted rope.
meanings.sent1: The cavetti added a touch of elegance to the picture frame.
meanings.sent2: The cavetti on the ceiling gave the room a classic look.
meanings.sent3: The cavetti on the cake looked like tiny ropes holding it together.
meanings.sent4: Her hair was styled with cavetti-like twists, making it stand out.
meanings.sent5: The cavetti design on the dress made it stand out in the crowd.

meanings.definition: A type of pasta in the shape of small twisted ropes.
meanings.sent1: She cooked cavetti pasta for dinner, and it was delicious.
meanings.sent2: The cavetti pasta was perfect for soaking up the sauce.
meanings.sent3: The kids giggled as they slurped up the cavetti noodles.
meanings.sent4: The cavetti pasta tangled on the fork like miniature ropes.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the cavetti dish filled the kitchen with warmth.
